entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 12:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: ESE 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain or ice pellets beginning early in the morning then changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm except 40 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 in the morning. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 in the evening then southwest 20 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
